abstract: Reversing its evaluation of a group of mortgage bonds backed by commercial property, Standard & Poor’s lifted the ratings Tuesday on several securities it downgraded a week ago, The Wall Street Journal reported.
snippet: Reversing its evaluation of a group of mortgage bonds backed by commercial property, Standard & Poor’s lifted the ratings Tuesday on several securities it downgraded a week ago, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: Reversing its evaluation of a group of mortgage bonds backed by commercial property, Standard & Poor’s lifted the ratings Tuesday on several securities it downgraded a week ago, The Wall Street Journal reported.

headline.main: The Strange Destiny of Mortgage Bonds at S&P

abstract: Standard & Poor’s Ratings Services placed American Airlines and United Airlines and their corporate parents on CreditWatch with negative implications, meaning that their debt is likely to be downgraded.
snippet: Standard & Poor’s Ratings Services placed American Airlines and United Airlines and their corporate parents on CreditWatch with negative implications, meaning that their debt is likely to be downgraded.
lead_paragraph: From Micheline Maynard, a DealBook colleague:

headline.main: S.&P. Puts American and United on CreditWatch
